website_summaries.verdict: If you put peanut butter on everything, this RXBAR flavor is for you.
pros: A balanced mix of crunchy and creamy peanut flavor
These bars really taste like peanut butter, but flavor is still well-balanced
Good option for anyone allergic to cashews
One of the only RXBAR flavors that contains a nut other than cashew
cons: Some reviewers found the bars a bit too sticky

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: These bars, when properly made, are excellent. They would get 5 stars from me. The problem is that the quality control is terrible. Some bars are fine, but then you get a batch that is so stale that it seems as if it was produced in the late 70's. If not addressed, the company's failure at quality control will destroy the bar's reputation. It's a shame - I love the short and simple ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten and enjoyed the chocolate sea salt bar before so I was surprised when consuming the bar again, it had a very rancid after-taste! I tried another bar in the box...same rancid taste. It must have come from a bad batch. I informed Amazon & I was able to get a refund back.
customer_reviews.author: ADJ

customer_reviews.title: Real food....watch the prices.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried multiple flavors of RXBARs. These are pretty good, but the flavor is a bit odd. If you don't like dates, don't eat them. If you can't handle oddly textured food, don't eat them. If you are looking for a bar that is made of actual food instead of mashed together chemicals that could probably be used to clean an oil spill...BUY THEM! Shop around as you may be able to find them cheaper elsewhere. Sometimes you can get a good price on Amazon, but the prices fluctuate like crazy. The last time I bought these I paid $19.99 on Amazon. Today they are $42.99.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Person

customer_reviews.title: I will avoid going forward
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw out more than a box of these. I had an incident where I bit a small pebble. I think I chipped a molar. I found an actual stone. Figured probably isolated incident. I found a hair in the middle of my bar today. Not on bar but inside of it. See photo. Really gross. >20% personal failure rate. QA apparently bad. I have no agenda but these hurt my tooth and ruined today's breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Halliwell

customer_reviews.title: I will preface by saying this is my favorite energy/protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I will preface by saying this is my favorite energy/protein bar. But the last batch I ordered was just AWFUL. The mixing quality was not up to snuff and there were tiny little seeds in about every bar (see picture). It was not peanut but some other seed that was very hard and not chewable. I have to be really careful chewing this batch because of this. It's a big turn off for what these cost per bar to have such a poor quality batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not easy to find packaged items with no added sugar and ...
customer_reviews.text: I came across RxBars while doing my whole30 eating plan. It's not easy to find packaged items with no added sugar and no preservatives. The RxBar has excellent ingredients and a pretty good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G

customer_reviews.title: Best natural protein-nutrition bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and would highly recommend them. Yes, they are chewy, but keep in mind you are getting a decent amount of protein and fiber, without using whey, soy, etc. The chewy texture comes from the dates being used as a base for most Rx Bars. My stomach can only take so much whey protein -- I stay away from whey and soy protein products. These bars are a great alternative that use egg whites and nuts as the protein sources. Pay attention to what's in your protein or nutrition bars. If you do, you'll really appreciate Rx Bars.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jones

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these, were delivered and everything was melted~ Could hardly get them out of the package and was a total mess~Directly to the trash after finding out they would not take a return on the crappy item. Did not even get to taste them, as they were such a mess, didn't bother !! Ridiculous waste of money
customer_reviews.author: JRN

customer_reviews.title: NASTY!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW- really gross! The “bar”, is actually a very small, thin, slab of dense brown sludge. Absolutely zero taste of peanuts/peanut butter., or even chocolate. It’s very hard to taste anything but the occasional flash of dates, but it’s not pleasant. The slab measures about 2”x3”, and although I was starving when I ate it, I couldn’t even finish 1/2 of it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Karl Becher

customer_reviews.title: As I worked my way through the box it was pretty apparent they had mold on them
customer_reviews.text: Moldy bars. Will never buy again. I noticed a little bit of weird looking stuff the first time I opened one, but thought nothing of it. As I worked my way through the box it was pretty apparent they had mold on them. They don't expire for 5 more months, but I have to throw away half the box.
customer_reviews.author: C_DuBack

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged/expiring
customer_reviews.text: This is a repackaged box of bars expiring next month.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Sticks with you, that's for sure
customer_reviews.text: This is a good healthy and satisfying choice for a snack, despite it's relatively small size for the price. The taste is better than average protein bar IMO. That being said, I can't give a 4-5 because the texture is frustrating - very chewy and sticks to teeth. I wouldn't advise eating when you won't have time to check/brush your teeth before interacting with others. At this price, it seems they could head back to the lab and work on texture. I originally discovered these at Starbucks. Also, I recently learned they are available at Targét and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Andre & Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Never again 💩🤮
customer_reviews.text: What I like about protein bars is the illusion of being a healthy person. The reality of protein bars is that they are not created equally. These bars have a great label that marketing wise really catches the eye. However if it’s a remotely edible snack you’re looking for this ain’t it! I took one bite of this God awful salty, nasty bar and passed it off to a relative who then promptly threw it out. What a bad late night purchase this was. I blame the full moon for this buy. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth NYC

customer_reviews.title: Missing ingredient: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, most of the bars have mold growing on them when I open the package... Too bad I can't rate a 0.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great bars!
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say, RXbars are awesome! Beyond the hype and controversy of "No BS", these bars ARE healthy and they taste great, especially the berry peanut butter and mixed berry flavors. These bars are actually filling too. I have never found a snack bar that actually satiates me between meals, these are the only bars that do that... but be carefull, they taste so good, its easy to eat more than one!
customer_reviews.author: SEA Dude

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but keep an eye out.
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this bar for me. Thinking it would be a good breakfast replacement since I have 3kids to get ready and out the door I find myself skipping it more times than not. Taste is really good not chalky type after taste like most protein bars. This would be a 5 star but in the 2nd bar out of the box I had I found a little pebble half way through finishing it. Thought it was a shell from a nut but it was indeed a little Rock. Probably won't stop me from ordering again but I will be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: HomeGrownWorms

customer_reviews.title: RXBARS are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.text: We love all the RXBARS and buy three boxes each month through Subscribe and Save. This one is not our favorite, but still worthy of five stars because taste is subjective.. The Chocolate and Coconut Chocolate ar our favorites followed by this with Blueberry being our least favorite. However, they're all good and tastes are different for everyone. I recommend you try them all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: They're hard, and dry and a complete chore to finish. You also need a bunch of water to make it happen. If you like the ingredient list I'd recommend looking into Thunderbird bars instead. Also, if you hate them you can't return them because Amazon doesn't allow the return of food products like Trader Joe's would.
customer_reviews.author: jmwestplate

customer_reviews.title: chew and chew like crazy, slurp the warm beverage to wash the ...
customer_reviews.text: these are so thick & sticky, I can't believe it! Take a tiny bite, have a warm beverage near by ('cause YOU ARE GONNA NEED it), chew and chew like crazy, slurp the warm beverage to wash the tiny nugget down your gullet....they realize how much gunk is stuck to your teeth. Spend the rest of the day picking this off your molars before dental decay sets in.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: It's better than a peanut butter and rasp. jam sandwich back in the day
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. The flavor reminds me, but is better than, having a peanut butter and raspberry jam sandwich when I was a kid. Neither flavor overwhelms the other. The texture is dense but not overly so. Definitely has some "chew" to it, which I enjoy because that means I am not scarfing it down. Simple ingredients, good protein, nice texture. For someone who tries her best to eat AIP, this is a great protein snack. Lastly, it was a great price on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E Anderson

customer_reviews.title: They Changed.
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite, before the Kellogg acquisition. Appears now to be extremely dry, too many whole almonds, and have shrunk in size. Yes, they were always chewy - but now they completely tear my teeth out and are incapable of being squished (at least the choco sea salt and coconut chocolate). The coconut chocolate got way lighter, it used to be my favorite and now it is absolutely not the same. Really, really, disappointed. The last time I had a good one of these was in 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aronoff

customer_reviews.title: Just found an RXbar I do not like! :(
customer_reviews.text: I am totally addicted to RXbars! I love that they are chewy and take awhile to eat them. I also find the nutritional facts work well with my way of life. But sadly, this box of bars will go to the homeless. There are raspberry seeds in the bars...quite a few actually....makes it uncomfortable to eat. It's really too bad because the raspberry flavor is wonderful! I would love to see a seedless raspberry chocolate combo.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great as a meal replacement or a snack!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Rx bars, but I have to say the Maple Sea Salt is my favorite (blueberry is runner-up). It's like eating a maple bar but without the guilt! If I absolutely have to skip a "real" meal, I'll eat a whole bar, but if I'm looking for just a snack, I'll eat half. It helps curb (bad) sugar cravings and does it without the added crap that our bodies really don't need. The Maple Sea Salt is great with a cup of coffee in the morning! Rx bars are, however, very chewy so if you aren't a fan of chewy, these might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Plaguedoll

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The product contained pieces of date pit, which are as hard as gravel. I contacted the company and they apologized and offered to send me a free sample box with all their flavors. They admitted they've had production issues but are working hard to resolve them. I will give them another chance at some point. I am posting this for a product I ordered in early 2018. By the time you read this, hopefully the company will have worked out their production issues. Personally, the chocolate sea salt was my least favorite flavor, and I love chocolate. Surprisingly, the fruit flavored ones were my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Production Problem
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered plenty of RXbars but this box contained a bar that was literally 2/3 the normal size. I've ordered at least a dozen of these so I guess it's not unexpected to find one bar that was "cut" way too shorter than the normal size -- but really, quality control should be better than this. Having said that, I'm still buying these. FYI, because I keep ordering the same thing over and over again, I can tell you that the output of these bars is NOT uniform/same. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Strange Batches
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase these RXBARs all the time, but I'm afraid I can't anymore. I'm not sure if they're being stored in a different way, but the last two batches I ordered all seemed to be really oily inside the package. I can no longer eat them at work because I'm getting oil (or similar substance) on my desk and hands, which is not ideal when working with computers. It also occurred to me that this may be happening in transit with the carrier during hot weather, but regardless they are not arriving in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: coloradobound

customer_reviews.title: PUMPKIN SPICE BAR TO DIE FOR!!!  THEY EVEN GOT THE COOKED FLESH TASTE IN!
customer_reviews.text: PUMPKIN SPICE BAR TO DIE FOR!!! THEY EVEN GOT THE COOKED FLESH TASTE IN! I am a flavorist and very hard to impress but this blew my mind! It was not "just" your average ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon family but a cooked pumpkin flesh note that tastes like really eating a pumpkin pie! Few merchants really deliver on pumpkin anything but RXBAR whole food protein bar OVER delivers on flavor and texture. Now I will be severally down if this is just seasonal and I pray its not. It my favorite by far, Maple Salt second. And I did myself no favors by admitting how GREAT these taste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dolen

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate sea salt flavor is my favorite. It's AH-MAZE-ING
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate sea salt flavor is my favorite. It's AH-MAZE-ING. But the size of the bar continues to shrink. I just won't buy them anymore because I fear I'll end up with empty packages one day. Just not worth the price any longer. Makes me sad because they're soooooo good. But, then again, so are honeycrisp apples, which aren't getting any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Perpetua

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped....
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews about how good these bars were. So I was excited to try them out. I eat a lot of protein throughout the day. But these fell short on the taste buds for me. I mean the first bite was.... OMGOSH.. gross... it got a little better with each bite... BUT... I should enjoy the whole bar, not hope I can enjoy it... so we will finish these off because I bought them... but I won't be buying these again. Kind of bummed about it... Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: I really tried to like this - but the flavor is just too awful
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this - but the flavor is just too awful. It's better after the initial sting of bad taste and then you can taste the dates - but the first 30 seconds are horrid.
customer_reviews.author: T. Epps

customer_reviews.title: only if found on a desserted island and you had no other food
customer_reviews.text: so, if you like things that completely stick to your teeth, taste like stale nuts, have no positive flavor and leave you wishing you'd just gone ahead and eaten the unhealthy snack, well, then, this is for you. i know some of you are into really earthy, does not give you pleasure food, because if it tastes healthy it must be...now im not knocking nutritional content/value, it may be everything it says it is, but its not for me. It has neither a chocolate or coconut taste to it, which was the entire reason for purchasing the box of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi K

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for stale packages
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this item a few times in the past and this time I received a stale box of bars. Circumstance would not allow me to return in a timely manner, so I am stuck. Just thought I would warn others to watch out. These bars should not be dry or stale tasting. A fresh bar has a soft easily chewed texture with good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Vic M

customer_reviews.title: Never had a bad experience yet.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for everyone else, but I love these things. The only thing I don't like about them is that they stick to your teeth, but that's pretty typical with food bars. The texture is great aside from that, and the flavor very nice. But, for anyone who just wants to try one, you might find some individual ones in health food stores, or get a variety pack, because they most certainly are NOT for everyone if my friend's gagging was any indication. (Ha! More for me, sucker!)
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: I may just have gotten a bad batch, but these are much drier than the other RXBAR flavors I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I may just have gotten a bad batch, but the bars I received were much drier than the other RXBAR flavors I've tried. The taste is fine but the moisture content is much lower than other flavors. There is a slight crustiness throughout that gives the impression that the bars had been left out of the wrapper for a couple of days. The appearance is similar to that of chocolate bars that have gone off. This isn't the case obviously since the wrappers are all intact. I may try to weigh some to see if there is a significant between claimed weight, actual weight, and the weights of other flavors I have.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Peanut Butter Chocolate Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I dig the ethos of the brand and was drawn in by the short ingredient list. I figured peanut butter chocolate was a pretty safe flavor for my first try. NOPE. So nasty. Smells weird, tastes gross. So so so disappointing, I have a whole box that I don't know what to do with now. Will probably leave them in the breakroom at work, all food disappears that way. I picked up a smaller box at Walmart of the maple sea salt flavor and that was delicious. I'll probably try other flavors but not sure I'll order them through Amazon-- some of these prices are bonkers.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients: sticky to chew
customer_reviews.text: Pro: great, simple ingredients. Filling and easy on the go. I like to keep them in my pantry for the days I don't want to make breakfast or have to eat in the car. Buying them by the box on subscribe and save helps reduce the cost per bar vs buying individual ones in the store. Con: sticky in your teeth and a little tough to chew. I always make sure I have a drink with these. If you have issues with chewing or your teeth, either skip these or break small pieces off at a time and drink with each bite.
customer_reviews.author: dLeilani

customer_reviews.title: Something not right with these bars
customer_reviews.text: I tried eating one, warm from the box, and it didn’t taste right. The ingredient list says it has egg whites along with other items. I wonder if egg whites need to be refrigerated, and this what was not right about these bars? Perhaps they need to be stored at the warehouse in refrigeration? In any case I couldn’t eat these bars. I’m not sure if they arrived spoiled, and nothing I can do after that will help. I don’t like throwing away food but giving them away could possibly make the recipient ill. I won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! My sister in law introduced them to me as a way to get protein and something for on the go/post gym! I am intolerant to dairy, and nursing my baby who is intolerant to dairy so this has been a lifesaver. I would agree that if you do not like dates, then this item is probably not for you! I do love that this is made of whole foods and I know exactly what is in there! If you're eating Paleo, give these a shot!
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaB

customer_reviews.title: Broken tooth
customer_reviews.text: So I really like these bars. Was hoping they would work out for me as a supplement to regular breakfast I was having which probably wasnt great for me. I read other reviews about rocks in the bar. Can't believe it but today I bit into one of the bars and a rock cracked my tooth in half. Can't believe this based on other reviews who had a similar issue. Now it's a root canal, post and cap for me. Buyer beware. Can't believe this company has such poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then they used to be???
customer_reviews.text: I formally tried the mixed variety box of the RX bar and was impressed with some flavors and others not so much. The maple was good, the mixed berry is great, the mint was OK. I formally liked the peanut butter but this time they tasted different and the bars appear smaller?? Is Rx trying to cut corners now that they have become popular? Also the chocolate sea salt I thought was good the first time I tried one. When I ordered a whole box I had a hard time finishing it, they are crazy salty!! Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: So, these are great, as long as you have super strong teeth. Really really hard to chew. I mean, you better watch your teeth. And, this is coming from someone who has pretty strong teeth, but i met my match. Other than that, one of the best bars, ingredients wise. But, until they make it slightly easier on your teeth, i am staying away.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Snowpiercer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the taste of these bars, dawgslam. As another review artist pointed out, they are reminiscent of the gel bars from Snowpiercer, save for for the fact that they contain peanuts and not cockroaches. Wait, “cockroaches”? In a five star review? Eh, I said it. They taste like fruit rollups IMO, and I honestly get annoyed when I forget to take one to work. I look forward to eating the peanut butter & berries goodness that waits for me at home.
customer_reviews.author: atasteforproduct

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a giant tootsie roll
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate sea salt flavor RxBar has the consistency, texture and taste of a tootsie roll, and is much saltier than I expected with many large salt crystals on top. I'll probably make my way through the box eventually, but wouldn't order this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: FleurDeLis

customer_reviews.title: I love RXBAR. It tastes so natural and like real ...
customer_reviews.text: I love RXBAR. It tastes so natural and like real food unlike other protein bars that taste like chalky vanilla flavored protein powder cluster. I love how it's naturally sweet and naturally pleasant. It is kind of chewy, and you can taste dates. I got blueberry flavor, and they taste so good. Blueberry and date goes really well together. I'm really excited that I finally found a protein bar that tastes so good and that is actually healthy.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Never buying food from amazon again
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating RX Bars for a while now and really do enjoy them. The bars from the store are good! The problem with these bars is they taste like they have been sitting in a hot warehouse for the last year. The bars were misshaped, due to probably the heat, they stick to the wrappers causing the plastic to stick to the bar, and worst of all.The dang thing tastes just as stale as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: Cswdodge

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with RX Bars Coconut Chocolate. It’s a protein bar so you understand that it’s not going to be a decadent dessert. But it is tasty (although a bit chewy) and is all natural while delivering extra protein. I rely on them when I crave sweets but want to avoid sugar highs and lows. Also, since they are naturally sweetened, I chop them up and give them to my picky grandkids for a sweet snack. Just don’t tell them it’s healthy! Husband even likes them. (Did I say “picky husband” or did I keep that to myself?)
customer_reviews.author: Cath R.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like “Big Red” gum 😕
customer_reviews.text: Banana Chocolate Walnut tastes awful!! I’m normally a huge fan of all the RxBar flavors. This one is the exception and boy is it dramatically the exception! It’s way too overwhelming on the cinnamon. It’s more like big red gum. Can’t taste the banana or chocolate. I was super excited to try this one expecting it to be my favorite. My household is typically a fan of anything banana walnut, however no one could stand to finish a bite. I’m not sure what happened. RxBar usually does so well. I’m hoping we just got a bad batch. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, STICKY, great for morning/on the go protein.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I expected at first- but, I like it. It's very chewy/sticky (the dates) and VERY sweet. It's also small, portable and easy to handle (in it's candy-bar wrapper). Works for me! I've eaten 3-4 in the week since I got it, great in what I used for those. If there's any drawback , it might be that for anyone who DOESN'T like very chewy, sticky bars (tooth problems? etc.) it's probably not your thing. But, I like it, and will probably order more (great replacement for Instant Breakfast, which I also use).
customer_reviews.author: AZWarmer

customer_reviews.title: Keep cool - I'm melting!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not do well in heat - it takes on the consistency of Taffy, chocolate coating melts and becomes oily. I take protien bars when I travel to make up for missed meals. Recommend Cliff Builders - they have none of these annoying issues and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Rider

customer_reviews.title: 🎃💩 pumpkin spice not so nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating RX Bars for a while with no issues purchased from Amazon. I was excited to try the pumpkin flavor. On my first 2 occasions eating these, I’ve experienced bad stomach cramps and diarrhea. Expiration date is ok so not sure if this is just a bad batch. I have no allergies to any ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: SheSween

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Banana Chocolate Walnut flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/hate relationship with RX bars. They are extremely chewy and gets stuck in your teeth but I do like some of the flavors and the ingredients are great. I've tried almost every kind and I love anything banana flavored so I was excited to get the banana chocolate walnut ones but the cinnamon taste is so overpowering and there isn't much banana flavor. Mostly tastes like chocolate and cinnamon. Pretty disappointed. The GoMacro banana almond butter bars are SO much better than these. Don't waste your money on these if you're looking for a banana flavored protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Key Weight Loss tool for me
customer_reviews.text: I eat one for lunch. It passes the requirements of my nutritionist friends who don't approve of anything processed or anything with added sugars. It tastes great, is satisfying and I know I am getting just what I need for some energy until dinner and nothing more. - I love them, and seriously- I don't know what I would do without them.
customer_reviews.author: SJPizMBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PALEO BAR OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: I'm suprised by some peoples one star reviews. I have tried several different paleo bars and this is BY FAR the best tasting bar I have found. And ALL the flavors are amazing. My only concern is that they get stuck in your teeth a little but other then that they are GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: These bars are the best. It's probably a total marketing ploy for them ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the best. It's probably a total marketing ploy for them to say there are but three ingredients or whatever the number may be, but whatever they're peddling, I'm buying because the bars are that tasty. Even my sometimes picky four year old asks for these bars and likes them better than typical kid-focused bars. I always keep these in the bag to avoid hangry tantrums ... from me and the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. Good taste and great ingredients. They are the perfect mini meal to hold you over until lunch or dinner, or they’re a good breakfast replacement. If I can’t do my typical eggs in the morning, I’ll eat an RX bar with some fruit and I’m good to go. The coconut chocolate is my favorite flavor by far, followed by blueberry and salted chocolate. The only downside to these bars is the chewiness of them. It’s really an insignificant complaint though considering how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Perez

customer_reviews.title: A+ quality and scrumptious!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars of all time! The fact that I can count the ingredients on one hand is a huge selling point, no artificial crap and the flavor and quality is perfect. The chunky sea salt on the top really knocks these little babies out of the park for me. These are often a replacement for that carb/sugary dessert craving that hits me. When I am eating a protein bar instead of chocolate cake or a cookie, it’s probably a good protein bar!
customer_reviews.author: Extendy Bendy

customer_reviews.title: In my bag at all times
customer_reviews.text: These work great on my autoimmune paleo diet. They store in my bag for travel and don't get melty or gooey. This is one of my favorite flavors, not all are great flavors, so make sure to try a flavor before committing to a whole box of one flavor. This and the Chocolate Sea Salt are my two favorites.
customer_reviews.author: kat.strauch

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best Protein Bars!
customer_reviews.text: These are the ULTRA UBER and best protein, meal, snack bars ever invented! They are delicious. They contain these ingredients and only these ingredients: 3 Egg whites, 6 Almonds, 4 Cashews, 2 Dates, and as they say “NO B.S.” I have never met a protein bar with such pure ingredients that taste so good! I’ve already ordered more. These gingerbread bars have 12 Grams of protein, fiber, 220 calories, and no added sugar. Eating one will keep me satisfied for hours. THANK YOU for creating such a purely simple, good product with wholesome ingredients! I am a true fan who will always have some of these on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT refuse shipment
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what is going on with USPS saying we refused this shipment because we did not. I have been waiting for this product. This also happened with another order of dog food my son had ordered under his name and account. We do not want to be labeled at Amazon as people who refuse shipment after shipment because of a USPS issue. I have a friend who works for USPS and I will bring this to his attention so he can see who the culprit is. So sorry for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlover

customer_reviews.title: Love them. No added sugar and taste good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find bars without added sugar. These taste great. My family has literally eaten hundreds of them and we’ve had no issues with quality. Yeah, sometimes the oil separates a little if they get warm but... worth it. I’ve tried lots flavors (chocolate, coconut, mixed berry and blueberry) and like them all. My 3 yr old prefers the peanut or peanut chocolate ones as the almonds are too crunchy. 5 yr old eats the berry ones but is most excited about the berry-flavored kid ones.
customer_reviews.author: MP80

customer_reviews.title: Great taste... time management may be a more interesting issue.
customer_reviews.text: Provides the same problem some of the other Rx bars have with the chocolate melting out and leaking onto the wrapper which can then spread... pretty much everywhere, but the taste is delicious and once you get over the entire looking like you are a kid who doesn't understand how to eat a fudgsicle then all is well.
customer_reviews.author: dawgguy@msstate

customer_reviews.title: Great snack! Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule which was fantastic because I was in desperate need of snacks! This is one of my favorite flavors of Rx Bars, just be careful and check the mirror after you eat one, they stick to your teeth awful from the dates. Otherwise satisfying and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Taste very artificial
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is horrible. It is very artificial and it does not taste like real food. It's full of glue-like additives that stick in between teeth. I feel like I have to brush my teeth. My children refuse to eat it and even ask me to PAY them to eat! Unfortunately, unlike Costco where I can get my money back if I don't like their product, I can't ask for refund from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Pikmin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this flavor at whole foods and it was deliciously out of this world. So, I ordered the 12 pack off Amazon. I have experienced two bars that taste like some chemicals have been mixed with it, rushing to the trash can to spit it out. I said ok must be just a bad bar, opened a second one and I had the same poisonous chemical taste and spit it out again. I refuse to try a 3rd one, I just contacted amazon for my refund. I hope there is nothing poison that I consumed in my body. Will not order these again. I will just stick with purchasing them at Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars But Some Quality Control Concerns
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite protein bar, but there are quality control issues. In one large box, about 1/3 of the individually packaged bars were opened. I didn't feel safe eating them under those circumstances so I trashed them. I also experienced strange situations like all of the nut butter centered in one spot on the bar. I've been buying this brand for years and the quality issues are new to me. I keep supporting the company because I like the simple ingredient list. I hope there will be greater product consistency going forward because these bars are wonderful when done right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I always get Rx bars but this last package was disgusting
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love Rx Bars---I have tried almost every flavor---and I like the Chocolate Hazelnut because it reminds me of a healthier version of nutella. This box was going to expire in August (and it's April now) but I have never tasted an Rx bar that tasted like playdoh---I know how the bars texture should be and I've gotten this one before--but I don't know if I got a bad batch or what but I couldn't even finish the bar--it tasted chalky and disgusting. I couldn't even finish one bar--I had to throw it away. And what makes it better is that there was no refund policy. So that wasn't cool.
customer_reviews.author: THISSY

customer_reviews.title: Left of porch in rain storm. Outer box soaked through to inner boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Box was left on porch during a rain storm. Everything soaked. Right in the trash!!! Waste of $$$$ Had to leave 1 star for taste and everything but was not really able to taste.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This Protein Bar could have killed me.
customer_reviews.text: Beware if you have peanut allergies. This company is mixing in different varieties in a box. If you are allergic to peanuts pay close attention to what flavor you are opening. In the box of Coffee Chocolate Protein Bars, I found two Peanut Butter Chocolate bars. Wrappers are very similar. Very dangerous if you have a peanut allergy.
customer_reviews.author: P Lo

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The Blueberry flavor is really nice, the flavor is not overly powerful to where it would taste fake. the flavor of blueberry stays in yuor mouth for a bit after finishing the bar... Like the many people who has already reviewed the product, the bar is very dense, you'll need some force to bite a chunk off after doing so the bar id chewy. it is a hit or miss depending on each bar where if you bit into it , it'll stick to your teeth. there are many other flavors in the product line. i can safely say that this blueberry one is good .... I DO NOT suggest the bananna flavor
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: i order these alot in maple flavor and they are the bomb this flavor become hard and stale very soon after purchase i only ate 4 out of the box the rest are just to hard to eat
customer_reviews.author: sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, filling and good texture
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a high-quality bar forever and finally tried these. They taste great and are a great substitute for a candy bar or brownie - just sweet enough to satisfy a sweet tooth but not too sweet. They have a great texture and consistency. The price is a bit high if you buy them in stores but buying them online makes them a little more affordable. I like the Mint Chocolate and the Peanut Butter Chocolate. I like the Dark Chocolate Sea Salt as well but I think there's a bit too much salt on them. Anyway, these are my favorite high-protein bars. Oh, I like that they don't contain a zillion weird ingredients, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Easy Snack
customer_reviews.text: I've been enjoying Rxbars while doing the Whole30. I'm in the reintroduction phase now and ordered a few more boxes. I had ordered one flavor (cheapest option of the flavors I like) and received a completely different flavor (which ironically is my favorite kind, but was one of the more expensive options!). So I'm very pleased with how the mishap turned out, but I still technically received a different box of bars from what I ordered (hence one star reduction). No regrets, all the flavors I've tried so far are pretty tasty. I'll keep ordering them even after Whole30 is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works well but too chewy for me.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it needs to do but I was not a fan of the flavor or consistency. It regularly gets stuck in my teeth and not a big fan of that. This is nothing against the product but it doesn't work for me. It is filling and I end up eating less calories during the day if I take eat this instead of a meal so they get some brownie points.
customer_reviews.author: L8rMr

customer_reviews.title: Cherry with chocolate is full of vibrant yummy flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I find these ever so slightly chewier than other flavors, ( cherries?) Surprisingly, square chocolate chunks simply melt in your mouth, If you can be that patient! Little yummy nuggets provide surprising explosions of heightened chocolate flavor. The cherry flavor is perfect, not excessive simply perfect. Yes. It's 1 of my favorites. Try them!
customer_reviews.author: cest moi

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy best one we’ve tasted.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried multiple bars and this is by far my favorite. You can’t taste the date and my husband who is picky he tried a larabar and spit it out. This one he loves and I know I’m giving him a wonderful healthier option. It’s great and filling for a snack and the carbs are at a Lower point for a snack at 23. Sodium is a bit high but still great flavor and we highly recommend. This is the cheapest price for what we found. We will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Teelyb

customer_reviews.title: I so much wanted to like these☹️☹️☹️
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I thought the Blueberry RXBAR was the best choice for me. I wanted something that didn’t contain a lot of ingredients, was a healthy alternative, and was still tasty enough for an in-between meal snack. I really wanted to like these, but was disappointed in not only the texture, but the taste as well. They are very chewy! I found myself chewing, and chewing, and chewing! On the plus side, they do have a nice blueberry flavor, and once my dog smelled them, she wouldn’t leave me alone! I guess she likes blueberries!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a Pier One Import store smells
customer_reviews.text: I normally like the RX bar and have had some different flavors and are pretty good but this banana chocolate walnut is gross. I don’t know if it’s too much cinnamon that’s ruining all the banana flavor because it has NO banana flavor. It tastes like how a pier one imports store smells in the fall. Like bamboo and cinnamon. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa R. Thryselius

customer_reviews.title: Yummy to my tummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! I just so happened to go to a popular store and saw these. I was on my way to a business event the next few days and needed some quick protein. I liked how there were just a few simple ingredients. The taste of dates is thankfully suttle. I was pleasantly surprised at how much I actually liked these. I wish the protein count was higher but it will do for my macro and micro needs. I was on a search for a 12pk when I got back home. Amazon prime is a life saver. Great price and of course a 2 day turn around is great.
customer_reviews.author: anewmeNOW

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tasting breakfast bars
customer_reviews.text: I use this to break my fast at around 12:30 each day - it's an easy and tasty 210 calories. Minimal added ingredients means "no BS". It taste very dense and moist, which is usually hard to find in protein snacks - I think because of the egg whites and dates. Either way, one of my favorite flavors and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: 10 bars, not 12.  Count the bars in the package.  There's only 10, not 12
customer_reviews.text: When I received this box, I noticed that the box was smaller than the boxes of 12 I had been purchasing at Costco. So I counted the bars and there are only 10, not 12 as advertised on Amazon. I looked at the outside of the box, and it clearly says 10 bars. Significantly more expensive per bar than I thought. Product is excellent though. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: change of flavor in the 12 pack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 12 pack as it was a great price. It isn't the same product taste wise. They cut back on the deep chocolate flavor and one could see it, before even tasting a bar of dark brown, to almost light brown and the taste reflexed it. Why gain calories, etc., for a bland taste? Maybe the ingredients are the same, but they cut back on the ratio of them and even less quantity. N.G.!
customer_reviews.author: janie mcc

customer_reviews.title: Go to for cycling
customer_reviews.text: I'm big on cycling, running, hiking and solo sports in general. I found the RXBars years and years ago when they were Whole 30 endorsed and only had a few flavors. They continue to be my go to for energy on the go. They're easy on the bike to just grab a bite and actually be satisfied with real food, not some weird glucose gel or sugar bomb. They fit perfectly in my pocket for easy access. My favorites are the berry, blueberry, chocolate sea salt (basically candy), and mint chocolate. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: STICKY and tastes like nothing
customer_reviews.text: Much too sticky (this is my breakfast option for the office) and I can't spend 10 minutes chewing the same bite. Also the extra stickiness is hard on my teeth which are sensitive right now so anyone with teeth sensititivies should stay away. The Salted Maple flavor, while the salt is nice (salted caramel is one of my favorite things) there is nothing maple about this bar and it tastes like nothing except the salt. They do accomplish being filling enough that I don't want to eat anything until lunch so if you like bland date bars, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: sweetlingua5

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I've had other flavors of this product and they were great. The mint, however, is just awful. It is like a chewy cardboard. Just found out that it is non returnable, so I am literally throwing away my money, as these are going in the garbage. I don't know if it is a manufacturing problem or if they are expired or what, but very disappointed that even though it is distributed by Amazon.com , they will not accept the return, even though it has been 2 days since delivery. Very disappointed, and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TRyder

customer_reviews.title: Waxy coating!
customer_reviews.text: These are normally my favorite in stores but when I received them from amazon they have a thick waxy white coating on the bars. Not sure if it is because they are old or what. Not impressed:/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but will not order again
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's this particular flavor or if the box was left somewhere too hot for a while but the box I received was not expired yet the bars are very hard. I've eaten three other flavors and they had a completely different texture.
customer_reviews.author: Furblong

customer_reviews.title: Energy
customer_reviews.text: This is a real protein bar, not a fun snack. It's packed with energy and isn't meant to taste like a cookie. Most of the sugar content only comes from the dates, so this is not a sweet treat. The taste is aquired. If you have a lower sugar diet you'll pick up on the natural sweetness more. These bars are dense and packed with energy. I thought they were a great quick and nutritious snack for me while taking care of a newborn. If I can't eat a meal I can eat 2 of these and be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to try these for awhile, and I finally caught a deal. They are lacking in flavor as expected (cause they’re good for you.) But, if you want a healthy bar that is made of ingredients you can pronounce, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Gable

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, all natural -- what's not to like? And no gas for me!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike one unlucky (and hopefully rare) reviewer, these bars do not affect my digestion and do not make me gassy... The taste is great, and I'm not too concerned about the sugar as it comes from fruit and I also don't eat lots of these; I just use them as recovery bars for after the gym. They taste delicious and it's just the right portion size for me. I like to refrigerate them nefore taking them because they tend to be a little messy when warm -- don't keep them in a pocket!
customer_reviews.author: esanta

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and they aren't loaded with added sugar like a lot of protein bars.
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you're not a fan of breakfast. They help me stay satiated until I eat my lunch about 6 hours later. They aren't loaded with added sugars like a lot of protein bars, but they also have a lot less protein(12g) than most protein bars (20g). If you're looking for something for the gym this might not be for you. They taste great if you like dates. All the flavors I've had taste like what it says on the tin, but with date flavour on top of it. I personally like the texture, it's kind of like caramel.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial, healthy morning meal; chewy in the mouth though
customer_reviews.text: (Daniel's wife:) These hold me for hours and they taste delicious. My favorite is peanut butter. I use them as meal replacement when I'm on the run. They are not overly sweet and they don't make me feel gross after I eat them like other protein bars do. They are very chewy, though, so I don't recommend eating them while having a conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Romero

customer_reviews.title: STALE
customer_reviews.text: Do not order. These bars are stale. I tried to choke them down even though I was afraid I would break a tooth. I had had RX bars in the past and remembered loving them. I went to the store and purchased a fresh one of the same flavor and it was entirely different. SO MUCH BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: YUM...This is by far the best RXBar flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am a health nut and I think that these bars are great. After dinner I always have a sweet tooth craving. Instead of choosing to eat a cookie or brownie, I have gone ahead and switched those treats out for these RX bars. They are sweet and healthy (the perfect pair). My boyfriend, also loves these. We will throw them in our backpacks for hikes. They are packaged great! Easy to grab on the go and soo soo tastey. I highly recommend the Chocolate Sea Salt. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Joy

customer_reviews.title: Mint is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge mint person, but these aren't bad. Taste like mint chocolate chip ice cream. Mint will stick in your mouth for a bit afterwards. I like these bars but I do have one problem. They lie to you directly on the package. They list almost all ingredients on the front except for the artificial "natural" flavoring. Of which they do not list which product code they use, so you can't look it up. There have been some very nasty natural flavorings out there that show early all cause mortality and or cancer in mice studies.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle and London

customer_reviews.title: Brand is average at best
customer_reviews.text: This flavor tastes highly processed. It would appear that the limited ingredient formula only varies SLIGHTLY depending on the flavor. Makes sense. Having been buying RX for months. The rationale-- it's often better than nothing as I try to extend my hours of IF--and then break the fast. UGH. Mint Chocolate seems to have decent macros. Often, these bars are slightly stale, and are TOUGH to chew. Not fun
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Maple is a great RX Bar flavor
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite RX Bar flavor so far. I love how these are minimally processed and without the additives that many bars today have. My stomach cannot handle certain things like chicory root fiber and insulin so prevalent these days, so it's wonderful to have bars like these. The maple sea salt is great - you can even have half a bar for dessert if you want, but they are not overly sweet to me. They are very chewy, so you need to take small bites and savor it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Have a beverage and a toothbrush handy
customer_reviews.text: Would rate this a 5-star on nutritional profile and quality of ingredients, a 4-star on flavor and a 3-star on texture, for a net of 4. This bar makes an excellent snack or could even be a meal substitute if paired with a smoothie or the like -- definitely have something to drink on hand, if not a toothbrush, because the RXBAR is very sticky and chewy. Have eaten 4 or 5 of them now and am still on the fence about whether I will ultimately reorder ... perhaps another flavor, although chose blueberry because it was the highest rated.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: EDIT & on second thought!
customer_reviews.text: Initial review: Maybe I wasn't hungry enough when I tried it, dunno. But sure won't order them again. Now: That's what I thought at first bite. Then, since Amazon wouldn't take them back, I decided to try one again, one morning when I needed a quick, easy breakfast. And, what do you know! I liked it! Now I have one every morning with a cup of coffee. It's sticky & slightly sweet but love the nuts.
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Melted
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before with no problem. They may have arrived ok but being that it's July and people work, you cant leave a perishable package outside if its not packed in ice or whatever else businesses use to keep an item cool. Now they taste funny and when opened you can tell that they melted inside the wrapper. They are garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Camcam

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack! My go to protien bar.
customer_reviews.text: No protien powder taste. Love the mixed berry & coconut chocolate. Really want to try the maple! My dietitian approved these for a morning snack to fit our weight loss plan and it's so nice to have something ready to grab & go. I keep one in my purse too just incase I'm caught w/o a snack. Great ingredients, date based, so they're a bit sticky in your teeth, not a problem though (wouldn't stop me) , also it works out great if you're drinking a hot coffee with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: RXBAR, Peanut Butter, Protein Bar, 1.83 Ounce (Pack of 12), High Protein Snack, Gluten Free
product_meta.description: Flavor:Peanut Butter| Size:12 Count (Pack of 12)We turned your post workout snack into a bar and packed it with protein. Made with real food––egg whites for protein, dates to bind and nuts for texture. Our gluten-free high protein bar is sure to pack a peanut buttery punch.
feature_bullets: A REAL FOOD PROTEIN BAR: Our Peanut Butter RXBAR is the perfect protein bar for any peanut lover. Made with real food ingredients— egg whites for protein, dates to bind, nuts for texture. 12 gram of protein. 5 gram fiber. Gluten free.

ANYTIME HIGH PROTEIN SNACK: It’s always the perfect time for a wholesome snack. That’s why we suggest trying this real food protein bar for breakfast time, lunch time, or as a pre or post workout snack. Eat the whole snack bar or save some for later.

GLUTEN FREE AND GUILT FREE SNACK: Paleo, check. Whole30, check. Guilt and gluten- free, double check. RXBARs are the perfect protein bar for any healthy lifestyle. Check out RX Nut Butter for a keto snack option.
ON-THE-GO PROTEIN PACKED FUEL: RXBARs are great for the office, on-the-go snacks, or just a wholesome treat. Grab one bar for a protein-packed pre or post workout snack and get the energy you need.
WE’RE THE BAR THAT RAISED THE PROTEIN BAR, BAR: At RXBAR, we make protein bars. Simple real food ingredients, no gluten, no added sugar, and no B.S.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
